basics.summary: I am a hard-working, self-motivated, and enthusiastic Software Engineer looking for my next challenging opportunity. I define myself as a proactive self-managed team member who has been working syde by syde with SMEs to develop solutions. My key signature strenghts are Perspective, Creativity, Kindness and Humor which allow me to have a better understanding of a problem and therefore resolve it with some out-of-the-box efortless and timeless alternatives. I am a valuable asset to be joined to any company due to my broad knowledge, fast learning, and multicultural experiences.

work.summary: I was part of the Traveller experience / Checkout team with other 6 collegues. We maintained and developed several backend micro services written in Java Springboot and 3 public SDK's (React Javascript, iOS Swift, Android Kotlin). These services were integrating with different payment systems such as Visa, Mastercard, Elavon, Cybersource and Cardinal.
highlights: Java, Springboot, Javascript, React, AWS, AWS SQS, AWS RDS, AWS DynamoDB, AWS ECS, Jira, Buildkite

work.summary: Here I work with a team of 5 people to develop a project management software for some goverment agencies. Development of web applications using React Typescript, C# .Net and SQL Server. Typical tasks are: discuss new features with SMEs and then develop frontend, backend, and database scripts.
highlights: .Net, .Net Core, Javascript, Typescript, React, Antd, Azure, Azure DevOps, SQL Server, Azure Blob Storage, Azure App Services, Azure Pipelines

work.summary: Improved Native Android App performance from 350MB ram to 110MB. Refactor bussiness rules and application of MVC pattern. Fixed 2 Fullstack Java Spring applications involving JQuery and Amazon S3. Developed a Spring Boot API and a React App. Developed a NodeJS API and a React APP to get meetings using Microsoft Graph API and display them on Smart TVs.
highlights: Javascript, Typescript, React, JQuery, Bootstrap, NodeJS, Android, Java, Spring, Spring Boot, MySQL, AWS, AWS S3, AWS Lambda, AWS Route 53, Swagger

work.summary: Sola.io is installs solar panels and sells the energy generated. I started in this company to assess every single technology they were using to reduce the IT budget and then integrate differents platforms to increase productivity and reduce processing time between operations. 60% budget reduced by integrating open-source software, integrating different platforms (such as SOHO), and developing APIs.
highlights: Javascript, Typescript, NodeJS, Angular, Docker, AWS, ZOHO

work.summary: Company that produces and sells weather monitors for farms. Integrate two different companies' data by developing and configuring an authentification server. I successfully set up an OAuth flow; from finding requirements, generating documentation, to finally developing 2 APIs to interact with an Amazon Cognito Server.
highlights: Javascript, Typescript, NodeJS, NestJS, Docker, AWS, AWS Lambda, AWS Cognito, TypeORM, Swagger

work.summary: Setup Jenkins pipelines to run different types of tests using ci/cd tools and send reports over Slack to different working teams.
highlights: Jenkins, Docker, Load Impact, Puppeteer, SiteSpeed, SonarQube, CI/CD

work.position: Full-Stack Developer Software Architecture and Cloud Engineer
work.summary: I am a Software Engineer with more that 7 years of experience. I define myself as a proactive self-managed team member who has been working syde by syde with SMEs to develop solutions and to communicate complex technical requirements to non-technical stakeholders. My key signature strengths are Perspective, Creativity, Kindness and Humor which allow me to have a better understanding of a problem and therefore resolve it with some out-of-the-box effortless and timeless alternatives.
highlights: Java, Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Jasper Reports, Android, Javascript, Typescript, NodeJS, Angular, Azure, Azure App Services, Azure Active Directory, Azure Blob Storage, Docker, MSSQL, Swagger, Keycloak

work.summary: Start providing sofware development and consultancy ranging from development of mobile application, web applications, backend services and database migrations to servers maintenance. The following list are clients to which I sold my services and I continue to provide maintenance over the years as either developer or consultant. Most of them are still in contact with me. All of these jobs were carried out by having to contact the costumer, make a proposal within a budget of time and money and make continues iteration over their requirements.
highlights: TLC (2018-2019): package delivery company. Position: Full-Stack Developer, Software Architecture and Cloud Engineer. I developed a full project including customer's scopes, API services, frontend web application and database. I currently maintain their servers and improve their services. Technologies: Javascript, Typescript, NodeJS, Angular, Docker, MySQL, Swagger, AWS.

Intelydrone (2018-2019): farm tech company which provides livestock tracking. Position: Backend Developer, Software Architecture and Cloud Engineer. Technologies: Javascript, Typescript, NodeJS, CentOS, Docker, MongoDB, Swagger.

DilMedica (2016-2018): supplier company of medical prosthesis. Position: Java EE Developer and Software Architecture. I  developed a Java Desktop Application to creates invoices, payslips and budgets. Technologies: Java, SQLite, Java EE, Hibernate, JasperReports

FiscalizAR (2015-2019): It's a personal project which I started to help counting votes in Argentina's election. To summarize, It is an android application, some APIs and a web angular application to track counting votes of different political parties. Technologies: Javascript, Typescript, Angular, NodeJS, Android, Docker, MySQL, SQLite, Swagger, AWS Lambda, AWS S3

Torneo InterCollege (2015-2016): amateur soccer tournament. Position: Java Android Developer and Software Architecture. I developed  an android application to show soccer players information and statistics about the tournament and a Java EE Desktop Application to submit data. Technologies: Android, Java, JAVA EE, SQLite, MySQL, Hibernate, AWS S3

Libraries and Drugstores (2013-2016): small to medium businesses that sells products to final costumers. I developed a software to track stock, sell products and report about selling and suppliers. It started as a one client project but over the time I managed to sell it to almost 15 costumers. Technologies: Java, Java EE, Jasper Reports, SQLite, Hibernate.
